title: Sabaton discography_FLAC
description:
Albums included in this discography:

* Primo Victoria (2005)
* Attero Dominatus (2006)
* Metalizer (2007)
* The Art of War (2008)
* Coat of Arms (2010)
* Metalus Hammerus Rex (2012)
* Carolus Rex (2012)
* Heroes (2014)

***

I started off by downloading an already existing (but incomplete) discography torrent. I then discovered that some of the albums were shitrips, and a few tracks were corrupted. I downloaded and compared with another discography torrent (which seemed almost identical to the one I already had). "Heroes" was missing from the discographies, and "Carolus Rex" had a corrupt track. I found a good torrent for the "Carolus Rex" album, and found "Heroes" from another source. I still had no good rips to replace the shitrips with, so I went on a Google search and got the albums I needed from file hosts. However, those albums were all single FLAC (+ CUE) files, so I had to split them into separate tracks. One of the albums was in Monkey's Audio (APE + CUE), so I had to decompress that, using the official Monkey's Audio application, and then convert the WAV file to FLAC (and then split it).

I also replaced some of the good rips, because I found better rips with more tracks.

The albums that I replaced (compared to the other discography torrents) are:

* Primo Victoria (2005)
* Attero Dominatus (2006)
* Metalizer (2007)
* The Art of War (2008)
* Coat of Arms (2010)
* Metalus Hammerus Rex (2012)
* Carolus Rex (2012)

Some other changes:

* All albums have been re-tagged with MusicBrainz Picard.
* ReplayGain has been added to all albums.
* I deleted "Fist for Fight" as a stand-alone album (because it's included as a bonus disc to "Metalizer Re-Armed").

***

I know, I know... I could've added the live albums. I could've waited a few days, and added the new album ("The Last Stand"). I don't even listen to metal, and I don't know why I'm doing this. But, here you go. Enjoy!

PS: If you want the live albums, they're available here:
 
http://losslessmusics.org/news/sabaton_discography_2005_2012/2016-03-26-10727
